glsa.title: OpenSLP: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in OpenSLP, the worst of which allows remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition or other unspecified impacts.

background.p: OpenSLP is an open-source implementation of Service Location Protocol (SLP).

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in OpenSLP. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition or have other unspecified impacts.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All OpenSLP users should upgrade to the latest version:
